session_info.title: Energizing Morning Yoga Flow
session_info.description: Start your day with gentle movement and mindful breathing

warm_up.instructions: Begin in a comfortable seated position, focus on your breath

poses.name: Seated Mountain Pose
poses.instructions: Sit tall, spine straight, hands on knees. Take 5 deep breaths.
poses.breathing: Inhale for 4 counts, exhale for 4 counts

poses.name: Neck Rolls
poses.instructions: Gently roll your neck in slow circles, 5 times each direction

poses.name: Shoulder Rolls
poses.instructions: Roll shoulders back and down, release tension
poses.breathing: Deep inhales as you lift, exhales as you release

poses.name: Cat-Cow Pose
poses.instructions: On hands and knees, arch and round your spine slowly
poses.breathing: Inhale to arch (Cow), exhale to round (Cat)

poses.name: Downward Facing Dog
poses.instructions: Tuck toes, lift hips up and back, make inverted V shape
poses.breathing: 5 deep breaths, focus on lengthening spine
poses.modifications: Bend knees if hamstrings are tight

poses.name: Forward Fold
poses.instructions: Step feet to hands, hang forward with soft knees
poses.breathing: Let breath be natural, release tension

poses.name: Mountain Pose
poses.instructions: Roll up slowly to standing, arms at sides

poses.name: Warrior I
poses.instructions: Step left foot back, bend right knee, arms up

poses.name: Child's Pose
poses.instructions: Knees wide, big toes touch, fold forward and rest

poses.name: Savasana
poses.instructions: Lie on back, arms at sides, completely relax

affirmation: I am energized and ready for my day
